text:
Pair App, by TenthBit. (San Francisco)

Hey guys, we're looking to hire a full-time:

- iOS developer

- Android developer

- Web developer

If you don't know what Pair is, it's a messaging app for couples. At this point we're processing 700k messages a day between couples and and have some awesome new ideas we're working on. Drop us a line if you're interested. We're open to relocating people to the Bay Area to keep the team in the same place.

Check out http://tenthbit.com/jobs for details, or send us a message directly to jobs@tenthbit.com for web developer positions.

You can also send me an email directly to oleg(at)tenthbit.com
